nodes.text: The Battle of the Gruffle was an event in the novel Allegiance in which Yeeru Chivkyrie got into a fight with a bartender on the planet of Coruscant over the ownership of the exotic fruit. Their argument grew into a shoot-out that did not claim the life of any participants. Because of this, Yeeru's allies jokingly refereed to it as "the Battle of the Gruffle".
